en.activitiesPlaceholderText: Share this page and get backers and sponsors to support your collective!
en.becomeMemberText: With your support, you’ll help us cover all expenses the collective makes in order to keep going. All the funds will be managed responsibly with your help, and everyone can see how and where the funds are being spent!
en.defaultTierDescription: Your donation will help us continue our activities. Thank you for your support.
en.disclaimer: By clicking above, you are pledging to give

en.membersWallText: Proud members and sponsors support this collective and allow us to keep going towards our mission. We would not be here if it weren’t for these amazing people. Thank you so much.
en.membersWallTitle: This is possible thanks to you.

es.membersWallText: Aportantes y Sponsors de este collectivo que nos apoyan y nos permiten avanzar nuestra misión. No estaríamos aquí sin tu apoyo. ¡Muchas gracias!
es.becomeMemberText: Tu aporte nos ayuda a cubrir nuestros gastos. Todos los fondos son utilizados de manera responsable y con total transparencia. Todos puden ver como utilizamos los fondos obtenidos.
